price: Ey insanlar! Şüphesiz size Rabbinizden kesin bir delil geldi ve size apaçık bir nur indirdik.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بُرۡهَٰنٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ نُورٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāakum bur'hānun min rabbikum wa-anzalnā ilaykum nūran mubīnan
